description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes whether or not a problem was detected or suspected with the heart.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

display.value: Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination incomplete
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination declined
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination not done
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination done, no abnormality and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination done, no abnormality with risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination done, abnormality suspected and no risk factor
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, heart examination done, abnormality suspected with risk factor
